website_summaries.verdict: One of the best folding salon chairs to buy if you want something with a lot of versatility.
pros: Folds into a variety of helpful configurations for different salon activities
Comes with removable head cushion, chrome towel hanger, and hydraulic stool
Chair reclines and has a foot rest
cons: Can be difficult to unfold and set up in a short amount of time

customer_reviews.title: Pipe/rod goes through hinge holes for head and foot rests.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy bed. Definitely recommend it. Also, I recommend that the instructions for assembly be updated. Make sure the rod goes through the hinge hole. I noticed people were a bit confused (rightfully so) on the assembly, and some clients have been hurt. See the picture of the final assembly step.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Behlen

customer_reviews.title: Went to use it and put Saran Wrap on it like I have every other chair I’ve owned
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for tattooing. What a nightmare. It’s way to tall to use unless you plan on standing up while tattooing. I had to pay to have the legs cut off 6 inches and rewelded. Went to use it and put Saran Wrap on it like I have every other chair I’ve owned. The Saran Wrap actually adhered to the upholstery. Nothing removed it so now I’m basically faced with having to use a solvent which will destroy the upholstery. This is a great chair for a massage but don’t buy it for tattooing.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas j.

customer_reviews.title: The chair is cheap, not for heavy people.
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these tables and they are seriously cheap as cheap can get you. They are dangerous. If your client is on the heavy side hold the table steady for them to get onto. I ended up getting a massage table because the head area gave out on me during a services and only injured my client. And the leg part will go down easily if the client doesn’t be careful getting into the chair. Not happy at all with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: its alright
customer_reviews.text: all parts were shipped, but couldn't install the foot levelers since weld material was inside the screw holes. parts list doesnt show the part names or an accurate drawing of each part, sooo..... thank you to the previous customers who posted photos so I could figure out approximately where the parts were supposed to go. I have a 6 year old who could draw you a better diagram if you need one. other than that, meh. stool was easy to put together, which is good since it wasn't on the build sheet either. other reviewers say good things, maybe it will last. good luck.
customer_reviews.author: liwang

customer_reviews.title: Good chair, poor design. Wont last without modifications.
customer_reviews.text: When I assembled this chair it seemed that the brackets that bolt to the chair base were not flat. This is caused by the cross support arms being 1 and 1/8 inch too short. I wound up making new support braces as well as adding a plate across the mounting plates to ensure that the chair didn't wobble and fail. The design of this chair is poor even though the materials are good.
customer_reviews.author: John whyte

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. It was a little tricky to put together since the instructions were mostly pictures but it's great
customer_reviews.author: Krystal L. Chromczak

customer_reviews.title: ... Instructions for the set up on this chair were terrible. Its All pictures
customer_reviews.text: The Instructions for the set up on this chair were terrible. Its All pictures. Also this sits a bit high and is hard for people to get in and out of .
customer_reviews.author: Josh and Paisley

customer_reviews.title: Tattoo chair
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a tattoo chair. It is very sturdy, great quality, easy to put together. My clients find it comfortable and most time even fall asleep during a session. It is inter changeable on arm rests. Easy to sanitize. Chair is comfortable and moves with ease. I have even placed this baby in the back of my truck and made house calls. This has been very beneficial for me and my clients.
customer_reviews.author: Luis maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair and the free shipping makes it a fabulous deal. You will need 2 people to put it together. HINT: when attaching the legs to the seat bottom, it is critical that you put all 6 screws in loosely. Add the cross bars then tighten the seat bottom screws. If you don't do it in this order the legs won't line up with the holes on the seat or the cross bars won't reach the leg bolts. It will save you a ton of frustration I promise! I wish the arms would lock into the seat but that is a minor issue. Overall I am quite pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Florio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chair and stool
customer_reviews.text: The chair is outstanding.. easy to assemble. It's very sturdy and we'll made. The stool I was also impressed with because it is comfortable and adjustable.. it was everything and more we could have wanted great price on it for a quality product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Box was looking rough when it got to me, other than that, well made tattoo chair so far
customer_reviews.author: Atomizer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Good height, material and STURDY
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy. We’ve been through so many tables looking for one that won’t wobble or drop the back rest on a heavier person, and this one is it. LOVE the way it rises and lowers the legs and back. I’m used to the ones with notches, but I like that you can set this to any height with the tension poles. The stool is sturdy too, good padding just a little small on the cushion diameter. Great quality and GREAT height for people that have to bend over their clients
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Bell

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The instructions did not correlate with the product. Products is sturdy as far as weight, however when it comes to raising the backside and the legs they are liable to fall. Happened to 2 people so far since I have had the product and they were fairly average sized, not over weight around 5 feet tall. There's also a part that goes with the product that doesn't explain what its for as well as nothing to lock it in place. Very poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Que

customer_reviews.title: Works great at the tattoo shop
customer_reviews.text: This was for my son and it's fine. The only issue he found is that it's very high up. (he's 6', but you're sitting while tattooing) If the hight were adjustable it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M. Buffurine

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't purchase another one
customer_reviews.text: This is probably not the best product for it's intended use the latch underneath broke putting it together it's really high for some people and the part that keeps you propped up slips alot so I'm really hesitant to actually use with clients
customer_reviews.author: AMBER

customer_reviews.title: Not good for people who like adjustable height
customer_reviews.text: Only adjustable from head side You can not adjust the height you would need a high stool if you are using it for facial It might be good for Tattoos Parlour
customer_reviews.author: NUZHAT HASAN

customer_reviews.title: The chair is very sturdy, easy to put together and clients have said that it's very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My wife tattoos and we bought her this chair. The chair is very sturdy, easy to put together and clients have said that it's very comfortable! It also delivered 3 days earlier then expected!! So far no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn Allen

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, awesome deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Product shipped quickly, packaged very well. Very easy to put together. The bed is awesome and my clients love it as opposed to a massage table(which I now use as a back up or convention only). Very sturdy and easy to clean. Very surprised at the quality for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Marie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to put together but overall well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the material
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. Highly recommend I am an eyelash artist. This table it’s just the right high and length/ with for massages also .. material on point
customer_reviews.author: CubanNatasha

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Needs thicker cushion but love this chair over all! Use for facials and lashes. No complaints from clients.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair set!
customer_reviews.text: Great find! Works great for clients, and good quality for the price! Easy to sanitize and adjust head and leg area. It is a tall table, which is good for what I use it for(I do eyelashes and facial services). I imagine if you were massaging, it may be a good height for the average person.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: this bed is not so good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Its just okay...this bed is not so good quality..the little chair is good tho. I guess you get what you paid for..
customer_reviews.author: minmin

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty good quality but it’s just have rip and scratches
customer_reviews.text: I would give 5 stars but It has a Rip and scratches
customer_reviews.author: Elvie Bagwell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Can easily pass out on this because of comfort and beyond easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair very sturdy and comfortable clients just seem to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great chair very sturdy and comfortable clients just seem to relax in it as I'm tattooing! Easy to wipe and awesome stool too!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table for my daughters new business. This table is comfortable and the price is reasonable
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have had this table for a year now and I absolutely hate it. It wobbles every time someone is on it. So much that I have to warn my clients every time the climb up on it. Then the arms pop in and out all the time. The only positive is it’s very nice looking and comfortable once on it. Here I am having to buy a new table already
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: good product I had for 2 years now and works fine easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: The Ink Mantle

customer_reviews.title: I use it for lash extensions and my clients always rave over how comfortable it is
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this table! I use it for lash extensions and my clients always rave over how comfortable it is! Perfect height as well!
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Its good happy with it
customer_reviews.text: No complaints with the chair, one thing I would like to say it lasted longer. Small stool that came with it is not quite comfortable. Rest all are good
customer_reviews.author: Deepak NBK

customer_reviews.title: All my clients LOVE this bed and tend to take naps while i ...
customer_reviews.text: All my clients LOVE this bed and tend to take naps while i do their lashes. Very comfortable and sturdy. A bit tasking to set up... had to have a friend help
customer_reviews.author: alex coe

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair.
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of looking we decided on this chair because of price initially. We received it in three days and was a breeze to put together. At first I was worried about how sturdy this chair was going to be, but after it was all put together it has turned out to be very sturdy. I have no problems with any size customer. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for an affordable and durable chair.
customer_reviews.author: tyna kirkland

customer_reviews.title: packege was little rough but product was in great shape unpacked it easy setup if you know a ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bed rfor my shop on july first and WOW did it get here fast was delevered on july third ..packege was little rough but product was in great shape unpacked it easy setup if you know a little about tattoo beds of this type.directions was pritty poor but once again doesnt take a rocket science to put it together not many parts ..all in all great buy for the money really comfertable and strong bed will prob buy another ...only reason i didnt give this a 5 star was the shipping cost and directions thanks ..
customer_reviews.author: robbie

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love! I bought it for my salon, I use it for facials and waxing it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Lezlie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this for tattoos, the chair/table was alot nicer than I expected, great quality, and easy to put together. I will definitely be ordering another when it's time to expand.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi D.

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed/chair. Parts came wrapped. And smaller parts and bolts were even pre tightened for easy assembly. The delivery time was on point. And all parts were there and professionally packaged. Would highly recommend this item from this seller. You'll truly get your money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Ta2dgela

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little iffy about buying a chair for my shop from Amazon. However, I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this chair. The stool is a little short for tattooing, but that's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: EazyEel

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: My chair is already broke... the arms broke off within 2 weeks of using.... and btw my clients are within weight limit. I am very disappointed considering the chair was pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Ros

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Came the other day and set it up. Very comfortable chair AND work stool! Flattens completely and both arms are removable for easier access to clients, especially for back pieces (tattoo artist here). Easily adjusts. I have it compresses in the corner here to save on space. This is a good sixes chair and will easily sit heavier clients too, very sturdy. The only thing I wish it had was an adjustable height. I like to work lower but it'll be fine. The assembly is a pain in the ass and my box got beat to hell in the mail but the item is awesome for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Tattooist approved
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this bed and stool professionally for the last year and it has held up very well. Very easy to clean, sturdy and works well for tattooing.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan H.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Put all of my lash clients to sleep! Every single one! Only downside is that it is a bit too tall when I'm sitting down, but nothing I can't work with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Height
customer_reviews.text: Used for cosmetic injections. Unable to adjust height. I’m 5’7 and this is about 1-2 inches too tall
customer_reviews.author: Alyson Chatelain

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Chair was broke when taken out box. Put the entire chair together to not be able to sit in because the latch that connects the top and bottom half of chair was poorly designed/ assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Taty

customer_reviews.title: Great tattoo chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Used as a tattoo chair without the arms. Easily assembled in about 10 minutes. Needed a small wrench that was not included. Sturdy bolts!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Smith

customer_reviews.title: 😊
customer_reviews.text: Definitely tall if using for a tattoo chair but I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Megann McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tattoo bed
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tattoo bed, took me like 20 mins to get it together and all pieces were complete.. like
customer_reviews.author: Hanky

customer_reviews.title: 5 star for the bed 0 star for the stool
customer_reviews.text: The table bed is good and sturdy but the stool sucks. It keeps lower down..
customer_reviews.author: Ey

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Hard to assemble! Also arm broke off after the second use. It’s comfy though.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Majuste

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Nice!! Very good quality !! I’m very happy with this purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bed. It’s much bigger than what I expected.

customer_reviews.title: Great tattoo chair for the price.
customer_reviews.text: A very good quality for the price. Solid chair we use at Tattoo Connection in Wantage NJ.

customer_reviews.title: I like the chair but the side seat looks used
customer_reviews.text: I like the chair but the side seat looks used. The back piece doesnt seem to sturdy if you are sitting up. Sits up high which i like. Great chair for starting out
customer_reviews.author: Litisha C Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: GREAT chair for the price. It’s sturdy. Some screws were a little hard to screw on but nothing major. Very happy to have this as the first chair for my business.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, comfortable for the price and purpose. Also came with the stool, perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Tina P.

customer_reviews.title: Put together
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed this bed did not come with instructions on how to put it together ! How do I put it together ??
customer_reviews.author: trina reynolds

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My stuff never was dropped. I want refound my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Support rods are a bit weak, but it doesn't affect performance for most clients. An excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Myth DeMorte

customer_reviews.title: it’s easy to assemble but it can get break down easy ...
customer_reviews.text: it’s easy to assemble but it can get break down easy because of how the stand from the back made when adjusting the seat. my money just went to waste -.-
customer_reviews.author: Jean Chin

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in the packaging of this item. There was no paperwork about the company. No directions I had to send off for them. Inconvenient for me. The bed itself is great for facials. Not so sure for massage. I was hoping to use it for both services. We are having to make do for now. I would not purchase this table for massage. I would purchase it for facials and waxing.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J.

customer_reviews.title: broken parts
customer_reviews.text: Stool came broken and instructions were not easy to use. Decent product for price though.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle J Bliss

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: There was a missing piece and what they offered for it wasn't good enough
customer_reviews.author: elda lezama

customer_reviews.title: great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, loved the fact that the stool came with it. The towel bar can be a trip hazard, it sticks out a little to far on the side, so we have removed it. Assembly is easy enough, all pictures, no text in the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Curtis

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!!! Just need to go to website and watch UTUBE video from company on how to put it together. But it is a great item!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use it all day 6days a week and very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money, all beds broke down after 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality for the price. Quickest shipping ever. It was delivered within 24 hours of ordering. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: jangel

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy just as the other reviewers mentioned. The bar for the paper roll protrudes making it a lil dangerous for a client or the professional. I thought it folded up and was portable but it's not, once it's set up its up. Other then that good product for the money. Would buy again. Easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: R Eva

customer_reviews.title: acarver
customer_reviews.text: After opening the box, we noticed that two feet were floating outside of the bubble/plastic wrapped chair. The feet were broken off before shipping as the entire chair, including the ends of the legs were covered in wrap. It took several days for the company to respond but we did get replacement feet in time for our use. So far it is a decent chair.
customer_reviews.author: acarver

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is awesome and the price is unbeatable! It comes with the chair and a stool. It will lay flat and the arms will be able to attach. It can also adjust to a sit up position on different levels.The instructions aren't very helpful but you can look instructions up on youtube. It's also very very comfortable and easy to sanitize! I'm so happy with my purchase and would totally recommend it. I got it for a tattoo chair and it works great for that!
customer_reviews.author: Sami Rose

customer_reviews.title: The chair itself is nice, but it has to be assembled
customer_reviews.text: The chair itself is nice, but it has to be assembled, which would be no big deal if it came with Instructions! Instead you get a picture diagram (my 3 year old could draw better) of parts with numbers! If you like jigsaw puzzles, you'll enjoy this!
customer_reviews.author: Spa 13

customer_reviews.title: Backwards Instructions- SUCK!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was too disappointed in this chair. The directions are horrible & the leg part wont go back up or all the way down. There are missing pieces ex. #9. (8 pieces???) i only got three. This needs to have assembly instructions in English. Has anyone figured out how to make the leg part go up & down smoothly?
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to work on it, and my clients love it
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great so far, Cant say over long time use but looks nice, and sturdy!

customer_reviews.title: my mother love to work on it

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. Hard to put together, but worth the trouble!

customer_reviews.title: Great product for good price!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Shipped fast and great condition. Directions were hard to figure out but once you get it together it's easy!
customer_reviews.author: Kayci J Wills

customer_reviews.title: love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It worked out perfect!! Thank god!!!! I was worried cause of all the other reviews but ive had no problems!!! Im blessed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elba Uribe

customer_reviews.title: tattoo table
customer_reviews.text: it's a sturdy table but the instructions are so small....if you want to call them instructions that is. It's one sheet of regular computer paper with 3 pictures so small you can barely tell what is what and no details on how to put parts together. Once it's together the headrest part of the table moves great but the foot area gets stuck constantly making it difficult to adjust for the client. Once it's finally together it's a good table for now but I will definitely not buy anything else from the company since I called customer service multiple times and sat I'm limbo for hours trying to get assitance with set up.
customer_reviews.author: tattoolady0506

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great table! We had a piece that arrived damaged and we contacted the company and they sent out the piece that day, free of charge! Never had any problems since :)

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair great price only thing that I didn't like ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome chair great price only thing that I didn't like was the 75$ delivery fee but as far as product quality 5*****

customer_reviews.title: it is worth it
customer_reviews.text: it is good to use it for what it says. I love it the only thing I had a little problem assembling because the screw didn't fit well,I had to force the screws.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were horrible... What the heck... But we figured it out and the chair is wonderful.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't adjust the height of the table ita pretty high , other than that good and stable,

customer_reviews.title: Love the beds
customer_reviews.text: I loved the beds! Great product, quality is good. Delivered on time. Well worth the money spent.I would recommend purchase to others

customer_reviews.text: There was a tear in the leather in the of the chair foot part. Small but there in a 90 degree angle about an inch wide

customer_reviews.text: I am happy .This chair is so comfortable and good working. I like this chair.and assemble very easy only half an hour . Thank you so much.

customer_reviews.title: We are very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my bf that's doing tattoos. We are very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: milley pate

customer_reviews.title: Can hold weight better then most
customer_reviews.text: This met my expectations fairly well. The only part that didn't was on my personal end for not planning the space wiser. The product it self so far has been a very reliable product. Was shocked at how sturdy this product truly is. Great product!

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for esthetician starting out
customer_reviews.text: i bought this chair and have had it for about a month now. my husband easily assembled it when it came (very quickly I may add). the price is right and the shipping worth it. it's very sturdy and seems like it will last a good long time. it als looks nice in black. if you're thinking about buying it, I would hit it for the price, quality and the seller/shipper.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia C. Ney

customer_reviews.title: its good
customer_reviews.text: This chair is great for my tattooing. Unfortunitly all four plastic feet were broken when I opend the shipping box.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price but the table is too tall
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price but the table is too tall. Shorter people will need a stool to get up there.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Frye

customer_reviews.title: nice chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a good buy super nice chair , easy to put together makes a really good tattoo chair very very happy!
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Works great for her
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our daughter that does facials at a salon. Works great for her. Its a little hard to lay on, but other than that great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This chair is fine but the construction is poor to understand how to put all the parts together.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: facial chair and stool
customer_reviews.text: The chair is wonderful. One of the leg(screws) was damaged when arrived. They offered to sent me a cheque to replace it but unfortunately I've looked everywhere for the replacement and no one has it. Hope I can find replacement because chair isnt usable until fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Bettyboop

customer_reviews.title: Extra parts...??
customer_reviews.text: Order came in VERY fast, and the box it came in wasn't too big. It was kinda hard to assemble, but they have a good YouTube video of how to put it together. Came with a few extra pieces (in pic), but overall everything was incredible. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Abeyta Jr.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Buy! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy. Well worth the money! It wasn't that hard to put together, It took me about an hour or so. Just make sure you have the right tools before you start? Like a Ratchet set! It's very comfortable and easy to move for one position to the other.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra. NC

customer_reviews.title: only 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving this chair 3 stars for two reasons: The directions are horrible! Not only are they tiny crapy pictures but in the directions some of the pieces are mixed up, so after I finally got the chair put together (which was not easy) the bottom and top halves didn't adjust properly. I had to take it apart and switch pieces around until it worked right. reason number two: I'm pretty sure I'm missing a piece and thats never a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Marcinko

customer_reviews.title: good starter chair
customer_reviews.text: this bed is a good starter bed for tattoos or facials however it doesnt wrk for barber or salon hair dressing wise because the height doesnt adjust
customer_reviews.author: Angela Elks

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products 71in 3-Section Multipurpose Massage Bed, Spa & Salon Facial, Tattoo Chair w/Hydraulic Stool, Removable Headrest, Facial Cradle, Towel Hanger - Black
feature_bullets: MULTIPURPOSE: This 3-section bed and chair combination works as a full-body massage bed, facial chair, or even as a tattoo chair that can recline to various positions as needed
ADJUSTABLE HEAD & FOOTREST: Easily adjust the headrest and footrest to keep clients comfortable as you perform various services such as massages, mani-pedis, and more!

ADJUSTABILITY: Provide ample relaxation, as the removable head cushion opens to a facial cradle for clients to breathe comfortably while laying face-down, and the armrests can easily be removed for more space to move; a removable towel rack also lets you keep hand towels close by
HYDRAULIC STOOL: Included with this chair is an adjustable, 360-degree swivel stool with a cushioned, faux-leather seat, providing restriction-free comfort as you work on your clients

QUALITY MATERIALS: The heavy-duty frame is made of high-quality steel that's welded for a sturdy design, and smooth faux leather is easy to clean for a chair that stays intact for years to come; OVERALL DIMENSIONS: 71"(L) x 24"(W) x 30"(H); Weight Capacity: 500 lbs.
